word: DO NOT FALTER IF NO IMMEDIATE ANSWER IS GIVEN.—Your faith must not let go of the promises of God, if you do not see or feel the immediate answer to your prayers. Be not afraid to trust God. Rely upon His sure promise: “Ask, and ye shall receive.” God is too wise to err, and too good to withhold any good thing from His saints that walk uprightly.—(Testimonies for the Church, vol. 1, 120.)
